#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> n;
        int i,win=0;
        int *a=new int [n+3];
        memset(a,0,n+2);
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            while(a[i]>=i)
            {
                a[i]-=i;
                win++;

            }
        }
        if(win%2==1)
            cout <<"ALICE\n";
        else
            cout <<"BOB\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
